REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1727 reute d f BC-SPARTECH-<SPTN.O>-MAY 06-02 0041

TEXT.TITLE: SPARTECH <SPTN.O> MAY BUY 10 PCT OF ITS STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Spartech Corp said it will repurchase up to 10 pct of its 2.6 mln common shares outstanding. The company said it believes the common stock is undervalued at current prices. Reuter
